tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerScores (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    score INT,
    achievements TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE player_activity_log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    activity_id INT,
    location_id INT,
    score INT,
    log_date TIMESTAMP
);
